title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist, the file becomes dirtied even though no changes are made to the code.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
1. Open the file in the code editor.
2. Trigger the code assist feature.
3. Verify that the file becomes dirtied even though no changes are made to the code.
